channel.title: Descending5ths on A J Greengrove's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Descending5ths on A J Greengrove's Site

item.title: The Woeful Melody of "Game Over" from "Final Fantasy I"
item.description: How is “Game Over” from “Final Fantasy I” able to evoke a sense of losing and game being over using a generic descending-fifths sequence?

item.title: Exploring "It's Time to Set The Sails"
item.description: It’s Time to Set The Sails: I ripped of an unknown composer’s “Forest Theme” from Terra Incognita, a Net Yaroze demo game.

item.title: Exploring "Waltz with Me Moose Giants"
item.description: Waltz with Me Moose Giants: a chameleon motive, very useful for weaving counterpoint.

item.title: Exploring "Chilly Nights, Quiet Winds"
item.description: Chilly Nights, Quiet Winds: a meandering motive searchs out and seeks, perhaps for a warmer breeze.
